definition: headdress that protects the head from bad weather
details:
noun
- headdress that protects the head from bad weather
= synonyms: hat
- a movable top or cover, hinged or separate, for closing the opening at the top of a box, chest, jar, pan, etc.
= example: a movable top or cover, hinged or separate, for closing the opening at the top of a box, chest, jar, pan, etc.
- either of two folds of skin that can be moved to cover or open the eye
= example: either of two folds of skin that can be moved to cover or open the eye
= synonyms: eyelid, palpebra
